argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lcfrlem7.h | |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) |
| 2 |  | lcfrlem7.o | |- ._|_ = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) |
| 3 |  | lcfrlem7.u | |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) |
| 4 |  | lcfrlem7.p | |- .+ = ( +g ` U ) |
| 5 |  | lcfrlem7.l | |- L = ( LKer ` U ) |
| 6 |  | lcfrlem7.d | |- D = ( LDual ` U ) |
| 7 |  | lcfrlem7.q | |- Q = ( LSubSp ` D ) |
| 8 |  | lcfrlem7.k | |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) |
| 9 |  | lcfrlem7.g | |- ( ph -> G e. Q ) |
| 10 |  | lcfrlem7.e | |- E = U_ g e. G ( ._|_ ` ( L ` g ) ) |
| 11 |  | lcfrlem7.x | |- ( ph -> X e. E ) |
| 12 |  | lcfrlem7.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` U ) |
| 13 |  | lcfrlem7.y | |- ( ph -> Y = .0. ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ph -> ( X .+ Y ) = ( X .+ .0. ) ) |
| 15 | 1, 3, 8 | #P_dvhlmod | |- ( ph -> U e. LMod ) |
| 16 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` U ) = ( Base ` U ) |
| 17 | 1, 2, 3, 16, 5, 6, 7, 10, 8, 9, 11 | #P_lcfrlem4 | |- ( ph -> X e. ( Base ` U ) ) |
| 18 | 16, 4, 12 | #P_lmod0vrid | |- ( ( U e. LMod /\ X e. ( Base ` U ) ) -> ( X .+ .0. ) = X ) |
| 19 | 15, 17, 18 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> ( X .+ .0. ) = X ) |
| 20 | 14, 19 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ph -> ( X .+ Y ) = X ) |
| 21 | 20, 11 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( ph -> ( X .+ Y ) e. E ) |
